data.name: Wargame Red Dragon - The Millionth Mile
data.detailed_description:
The Millionth Mile is the first free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon.

Focusing on the Eastern Bloc coalition, it will feature more than 60 new units for Poland, Czechoslovakia & East-Germany, bringing them in the 90’s and on an equal footing with W:RD’s main nations. The whole range of units will be represented: infantry, tanks, planes, troop transports, helicopters, …

But The Millionth Mile will also introduce a brand new kind of unit, in the form of AShM (anti-ship missile) truck carrier, which are missile artillery units capable of engaging ships over a long distance, from land. 6 of those will be included, split as 3 per alliance.

data.short_description: The Millionth Mile is the first free DLC for Wargame: Red Dragon.Focusing on the Eastern Bloc coalition, it will feature more than 60 new units for Poland, Czechoslovakia & East-Germany, bringing them in the 90’s and on an equal footing with W:RD’s main nations.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: WINDOWS XP SP3/WINDOWS VISTA SP2/WINDOWS 7/WINDOWS 8
  • 处理器: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ
  • 内存: 2048 MB RAM
  • 图形: 256 MB 100% DIRECTX 9 AND SHADERS 3.0 COMPATIBLE ATI RADEON X1800 GTO/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600 GT/INTEL HD 3000 OR HIGHER
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 1500 MB 可用空间
  • 声卡: DIRECTX 9 COMPATIBLE
  • 附注事项: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR ONLINE GAMING

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: MAC OS X 10.7
  • 处理器: INTEL CORE 2 DUO 2.4 GHZ
  • 内存: 2048 MB RAM
  • 图形: 256 MB ATI RADEON HD 4670/NVIDIA GEFORCE GT120/320M OR HIGHER
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 1500 MB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR ACTIVATION AND ONLINE GAMING

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: UBUNTU 12.04 LTS 64bits/UBUNTU 12.10 64bits/SteamOS 64bits
  • 处理器: AMD/INTEL DUAL-CORE 2.5 GHZ
  • 内存: 2048 MB RAM
  • 图形: 256 MB SHADERS 3.0 COMPATIBLE. ATI RADEON X1800 GTO/NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600 GT/INTEL HD 3000 OR HIGHER
  • 存储空间: 需要 1500 MB 可用空间
